column4: my xserver keeps restarting when i hit backspace to delete a whole line of text i'm using hardy any tips?
are you sure you aren't pressing CTRL+ALT by mistake/intention when hitting backspace ?

two things could be wrong -- one, your ctrl+alt keys might be stuck down (faulty keyboard) -- two, firefox is somehow crashing so bad it causes X to quit ? so question, does the backspace problem manifest itself in other applications other than firefox?
hmm, not sure i know what could be causing this - all i can suggest is you upgrade to the latest version of xorg to hopefully rectify the problem
